sentence: Mr. GOMEZ. Mr. Speaker, today I was not recorded on Roll Call No.  305. Had I been present, I would have voted ``NAY'' on Roll Call No.  305.
Ms. DelBENE. Mr. Speaker, I necessarily had to miss the vote. Had I  been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 305.
